snippet: Oil prices kept dropping, below $48 a barrel in New York, and disappointing data on the U.S. services sector and factory orders also took a toll.
lead_paragraph: Oil prices kept dropping, below $48 a barrel in New York, and disappointing data on the U.S. services sector and factory orders also took a toll.

headline.main: Market Continues Slide as Investors’ Unease Rises
headline.print_headline: Market Continues Slide as Investors’ Unease Rises
